profile:
At Restoration 1 Peterborough we specialize in water damage restoration services, fire and smoke clean up, sewage clean up, mould remediation and storm disaster response. With our state of the art drying services we are able to restore residential and commercial properties to the original condition or better.  No job is too big or too small for us.  Since we work with the insurance companies, not for them, our commitment is to you, the property owners.

Servicing Peterborough and Clarington

Water Damage 
Fire Damage 
Mould Removal 
Sewage Cleanup 
Storm Response
